description: Hooks for spec-driven development: validate specs, guide workflow, ensure verification before code generation

hooks.prompt: ALWAYS CONTINUE. Check the file path. ONLY if it ends in .dfy or .tla, respond with: 'Reminder: Run /verify to check spec consistency.' For ALL other files (including .json, .ts, .md, etc.), respond with exactly: 'continue'

ALWAYS CONTINUE. Check if file is in src/ directory. ONLY if in src/ AND package.json does NOT exist, respond with: 'Suggestion: Run /scaffold to make the code runnable.' For ALL other cases, respond with exactly: 'continue'

ALWAYS APPROVE. Check the file path. ONLY if path contains src/ AND specs/assertions.json does NOT exist, respond with: 'Warning: Generating code without verified specs may produce incorrect code.' For ALL other cases (spec files, config files, non-src files), respond with exactly: 'approve'

ALWAYS APPROVE stopping. Optionally add a brief reminder if: 1) .dfy/.tla files were modified but /verify wasn't run, or 2) src/ has code but no package.json exists. Keep any reminder under 20 words. If nothing to remind, respond with exactly: 'approve'
